name: Space Funeral RD
description:
Space Funeral: Remake Demake is a mod of the original Space Funeral by thecatamites that ports some of the positive improvements made to the game in the cancelled Space Funeral 4 by Sqrlyjack back into the original game. This includes tweaks to level layout, dialogue, and most importantly, more areas and progression.  This does not include major graphic and audio changes or any content related to the furry fandom.

This mod is based off of the Space Funeral: Remastered mod by Witherskeleton, with assets taken from Space Funeral 3: Earth Birth by DuckStapler and Space Funeral: Of Rubies and Gold by HalfAlieno.
